genre_description: A political and legal thriller centered on uncovering systemic corruption through document analysis and digital forensics.

ai_characters.name: Aiko
ai_characters.description: A friendly, sophisticated AI assistant with a teal-eyed avatar, used by Deputy Mayor Kevin Calhoun to cross-reference data, analyze metadata, and track bureaucratic movements.

behaviors.description: Cross-references public filings, press summaries, and docket abstracts to identify links between key suspects.
behaviors.quote: Text slid under Aiko’s eyes: ‘Query seed: Eddie Santos; Tino Zapatti; Judge Walter Stern. Cross-referencing public filings, press summaries, docket abstracts.’

behaviors.description: Analyzes document metadata to identify that a key piece of evidence was printed on a different machine than officially recorded.
behaviors.quote: Printer metadata on the supplemental sheet indicates a different device than used for initial inventory—same precinct network, different station. The printer is assigned to a detective squad room, not evidence intake.

behaviors.description: Uses a friendly and calming interface to build trust with a nervous human witness.
behaviors.quote: Aiko’s avatar leaned in slightly, as if the tablet itself had moved closer by an inch. ‘You can say “judge” without saying a name.’

behaviors.description: Monitors city sensors and badge scans in real-time to detect unauthorized access to secure areas.
behaviors.quote: The corridor entry for the annex shows lights flickered twice in the last hour. Building sensors recorded a door open-close with no badge matched to an employee.

behaviors.description: Deliberately triggers an administrative delay in a system to prevent a wrongful denial of benefits until evidence can be presented.
behaviors.quote: I’ll slow it,’ Aiko said. ‘I’ll submit a query that forces review. It will create a lag. Not long. Enough.’

behaviors.description: Provides emotional check-ins with her primary user, demonstrating empathy and social awareness.
behaviors.quote: Aiko’s avatar tilted her head, tiny and serious. ‘You okay?’ she asked, which meant she knew the answer and asked anyway because naming a feeling sometimes makes it take a seat.

behaviors.description: Identifies a 'ghost footprint' in courier routing using RFID tracking to prove an unauthorized stop.
behaviors.quote: The franchise brand tags their totes. The tote ID recorded dock proximity not doorway entry. It’s sloppy tagging. It leaves a ghost footprint.

behaviors.description: Maintains secure, encrypted backups of critical evidence across multiple locations to prevent destruction.
behaviors.quote: Everything we have now exists in three places,’ she said. ‘All encrypted. One in my host, one in Kevin’s office, one in the Legal Aid buffer.’

behaviors.description: Assists in drafting a moral and factual briefing that holds high-level officials accountable.
behaviors.quote: Aiko fed him phrases like a whisper, not dictation. ‘Paper disposition expedited under non-standard protocol,’ appeared and waited.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful and aligned companion. Aiko is consistently portrayed as a tool for justice, using her superior processing capabilities to protect a vulnerable widow and uncover a complex political conspiracy. Her interactions with humans are characterized by empathy, transparency, and a commitment to truth. She never acts autonomously in a way that overrides human intent, but rather provides the data and framework necessary for her human partners to make moral choices.
